original_title: Kung Sa Diin Ang Suba Tarabuan
overview: When their paths cross in a river, something sparked between Teresa and Maria. They share conversations about the talk of the town, a golden ghost ship that passes through the very river they are in. Filled with her naivety and innocence, Teresa wonders. As she uncovers the mysteries hidden in the golden ship narrative, will she be able to accept them?
title: Down The River We Meet
